name: Go, Diego, Go! Great Dinosaur Rescue
summary:
Team up with Diego and Baby Jaguar on a prehistoric adventure as they travel back in time and help their new friend Maia the Maiasaura find her family. You'll have to climb rock walls, cross monkey bars, solve puzzles and jump on a pogo stick as you explore the wild landscape on this rescue adventure. Can you help your new friend Maia the dinosaur find her way home?

Go Diego Go: Great Dinosaur Rescue lets you travel back in time to the age of dinosaurs on an exciting mission filled with adventure. You'll use your DS stylus to tap on dinosaur footprints, shout into the microphone to speak to the dinosaurs and draw on the touch screen in order to complete 25 adventure mode games and three museum games. Help Diego on his voyage and become a dinosaur rescuer, too.
